verses.1: Zion khuapi i ngaihsut khak ciangin Babylon luite gei ah eite tu sukin i kapkap hi.
verses.2: Tua lai-a gialhek kungte tungah i laiza lasaknate i khai hi;
verses.3: bang hang hiam cih leh ei hong man mite in la i sak ding hong deih a, ei hong bawlsiate in i gualnop ding hong deihin, “Zion late khat hong sak un,” hong ci uh hi.
verses.4: Topaʼ la, gam dangah bangci sak theih ding ihi hiam?
verses.5: Jerusalem khuapi aw, nang kong mangngilh taak leh ka taklam khut buisum tahen!
verses.6: Nang kong phawk kei a, keiʼ lungdamna a lian pen sangin Jerusalem a sang zaw-in kong koih kei taak leh ka dang tawng ah ka leii toncip tahen!
verses.7: Topa aw, Jerusalem a siat hun lai-in Edom mite in, “Sumai un, sumai un! A bulpi dongin sumai un!” a cih vialna uh phawk in.
verses.8: Mi susia Babylon aw, koteʼ tungah nong bawl bangin nang tungah hong thuk pa in lungdamna ngah tahen!
verses.9: Na taneute hong laksakin suangtumpi denna-in a hong neihsak pa in lungdamna ngah tahen!
